q: What 4 basic elements must the logline satisfy?
a:
1. Irony - must be ironic and emotionally involving (an itch you have to scratch).

2. Compelling mental picture - a whole movie must bloom into mind.

3. Audience & Cost - tone, target audience, scenes, locations, etc. the buyer has to know if they'll make a profit.

4. Killer title - a great title is clever, punchy, and has to say 'what the movie is.'
